tool_description: ultra-simple and ultra-fast api for searching and downloading music from a large database of audio tracks
name: Simple Music API++
title: Simple Music API++

api_list.name: Get
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://simple-music-api.p.rapidapi.com/music/get"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simple-music-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
